embed.description:
Welcome to the activity roster setup.
Please select a game.

fields.name: :one: Destiny 2
fields.value: Create an activity roster for Destiny 2.

fields.name: :two: Jackbox
fields.value: Create an activity roster for Jackbox.

fields.name: :three: Other
fields.value: Create and activity roster for another game. Please describe the activity in the description.

embed.description:
Welcome to the activity roster setup.
Please select an activity type.

fields.name: :one: Vanguard <:grandmaster:843042055697596417>
fields.value: Fight against combatants in three-man Vanguard operations.

fields.name: :two: Crucible <:crucible:843041980770025492>
fields.value: Test your might against other Guardians in the Crucible or Trials.

fields.name: :three: Gambit <:gambit:843041954900082698>
fields.value: Battle combatants and other Guardians in the Drifter's quasi-legal Gambit.

fields.name: :four: Raids <:vault_of_glass:843040539045920799>
fields.value: Confront the enemies of humanity in a six-man fireteam raid activity.

fields.name: :five: Seasonal <:placeholder:843261576312258600>
fields.value: Take part in seasonal activities; fight for the allies of humanity and for the Last City.

fields.name: :six: Campaign <:placeholder:843261576312258600>
fields.value: Experience the Witch Queen Campaign either normally or on Legendary difficulty.

embed.description:
Fight against combatants in three-man Vanguard operations.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: Normal Strikes
fields.value: Create a team of three Guardians and take on the normal Strikes.

fields.name: :two: Nightfall: The Ordeal
fields.value: Defeat the enemies of humanity in the weekly Nightfall.

fields.name: :three: Grandmaster Nightfall
fields.value: Work your way through the hardest missions the Vanguard has to offer to earn Adept loot. Good luck.

fields.name: :four: Battlegrounds
fields.value: Challenge the Cabal to the gladiatorial Rite of Proving, and defeat Caiatl's to-be War Councillors.

embed.desciption:
Test your might against other Guardians in the Crucible or Trials.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: Control
fields.value: Capture and defend zones in a 6v6 PvP activity.

fields.name: :two: Rotation (3v3)
fields.value: Join the 3v3 rotating gamemodes. Pick this option if you wish to play a 3v3 rotator gamemode.

fields.name: :three: Rotation (6v6)
fields.value: Join the 6v6 rotating gamemodes. Pick this option if you wish to play a 6v6 rotator gamemode.

fields.name: :four: Survival
fields.value: Join with two other Guardians to deplete the enemy team's lives while maintaining your own.

fields.name: :five: Trials of Osiris
fields.value: Engage in the card-based 3v3 Trials of Osiris and earn exclusive weapons and Flawless rewards.

fields.name: :six: Private Match (3v3)
fields.value: Invite others to play a private Crucible match, with a 3v3 gamemode and map of your choosing.

fields.name: :seven: Private Match (6v6)
fields.value: Invite others to play a private Crucible match, with a 6v6 gamemode and map of your choosing.

embed.description:
Battle combatants and other Guardians in the quasi-legal engagements of the Drifter's Gambit.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: Gambit
fields.value: Collect Motes from combatants and bank to summon a Taken Primeval. Invade the other Guardians' battlefield to deny a chance for them to bank.

fields.name: :two: Private Match
fields.value: Invite others to play a private Gambit match. Literally nobody clicks this button. You might actually be the first to try it.

embed.description:
Confront the enemies of humanity in a six-man raid activity.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: [PLACEHOLDER] ?????? (Witch Queen Raid)
fields.value:
[PLACEHOLDER] The new raid releasing for Witch Queen.
Use this to set up day-one raid groups.

fields.name: :two: Vault of Glass
fields.value: Make your own fate by fighting through the underbelly of Venus to defeat Atheon, Time's Conflux.

fields.name: :three: Deep Stone Crypt
fields.value: Uncover the legacy of the Bray family, and defend Europa against the remnants of House Salvation.

fields.name: :four: Garden of Salvation
fields.value: Follow the Darkness's signal into the Black Garden to defeat the Sanctified Mind, Sol Inherent.

fields.name: :five: Last Wish
fields.value: Venture into the heart of the Dreaming City to free Savathûn's captives and slay the Taken Ahamkara, Riven of a Thousand Voices.

embed.description:
Make your own fate by fighting through the underbelly of Venus to defeat Atheon, Time's Conflux.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: Legend
fields.value: Play through the Vault of Glass raid at the original difficulty.

fields.name: :two: Master
fields.value:
The Vault awaits you, Guardian. Play through the Vault of Glass raid with a higher light level, tougher enemies, and more champions.
Completing challenges in the Vault will drop Timelost weapons.

embed.description:
Take part in seasonal activities; fight for the allies of humanity and for the Last City.
Please select an activity.

fields.name: :one: The Wellspring
fields.value: Join five other Guardians to take control of the Wellspring from the Lucent Brood on one day, and defend it from the Scorn on the next.

fields.name: :two: PsiOps Battlegrounds
fields.value: Ally with Caiatl and her Psions to take down the Lucent Brood.

embed.description: Please type a description for this activity. (Max 1024 characters)
Reply to this message with the date and time that the activity will start.

fields.name: Format:
fields.value: the date and time should be in the format `mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am|pm`.

fields.name: Important Note:
fields.value: Currently, local time conversion is not supported, and all dates and times will be Eastern Time.
